Package media.xuggle

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecodePlayVid
    Takes a media container, finds the first video stream, decodes that stream, and then displays the video frames, at the frame-rate specified by the container, on a window.
    DecoderXuggle  
    EncoderXuggle
    Basic methods to deal with buffered images we get from music video packets so that we can manipulate them and recode a video.
    ModifyMusicVideo
    Read and modify audio and video frames and use the IMediaWriter to encode that media and write it out to a file.
    ModifyMusicVideo.TimeStampTool
    Create a tool which adds a time stamp to a video image.
    MusicVideoXuggle
    Implementation class for music video interface using Xuggler as the media interface to FFMpeg
